AutoReplacement.Replacement: SELECT J.name AS JobName, JS.step_id AS Step#, JS.command AS SSISLocation, CASE JS.last_run_outcome WHEN 0 THEN 'Failed' WHEN 1 THEN 'Succeeded' WHEN 2 THEN 'Retry' WHEN 3 THEN 'Canceled' WHEN 5 THEN 'Unknown' -- In Progress END AS LastRunStatus, STUFF(STUFF(RIGHT('000000' + CAST(JS.last_run_duration AS VARCHAR(6)), 6), 3, 0, ':'), 6, 0, ':') AS Run_Time FROM msdb.dbo.sysjobs AS J INNER JOIN msdb.dbo.sysjobsteps AS JS ON J.job_id = JS.job_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND JS.subsystem = 'SSIS' ORDER BY 1 ;
